meanings.definition: In a rude or insensitive manner
meanings.sent1: She crassly interrupted the conversation with a loud burp.
meanings.sent2: He spoke crassly without considering others' feelings.
meanings.sent3: The clown crassly honked his nose during the serious meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her words cut through the tension in the room crassly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher crassly shouted at the students to be quiet.

meanings.sent1: The crassly painted walls clashed with the elegant furniture.
meanings.sent2: His crassly behavior at the party offended many guests.
meanings.sent3: The crassly dressed man wore mismatched socks to the formal event.
meanings.sent4: The crassly designed logo failed to attract customers.
meanings.sent5: The crassly written email had numerous spelling errors.
